name: SEIZON
description:
Seizon is a rogue-like game made on Unity where you have to move through the different floors of the dungeon by picking objects and increasing your player stats.

Floors will be generated randomly by a seed and a dungeon-cave generator.

It is going to be available on PC with full compatibility with controller.

Highlights the prioritization of music against the effects for a clean environment to increase the player immersion.

Remember, each achievement is a new furniture to your shelter.
